sanskrit_verse:
ज्येष्ठेन जातमात्रेण पुत्री भवति मानवः ।
पितॄणामनृणश्चैव स तस्मात्सर्वमर्हति ॥ ९.१०६॥
transliteration:
jyeṣṭhena jātamātreṇa putrī bhavati mānavaḥ |
pitṝṇāmanṛṇaścaiva sa tasmātsarvamarhati || 9.106||
sph_interpretive_translation: The firstborn male child, by virtue of his birthright, becomes the designated heir and upholder of ancestral duty; being unindebted to ancestors, he is entitled to all inheritance and spiritual authority.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority derives from ontological precedence and spiritual alignment
Causation flows from divine order, not social construct
Capacity-based responsibility is determined by inherent dharma, not external attribution
Restoration logic prioritizes continuity of sacred lineage and cosmic function
Consciousness alignment ensures rightful succession without conflict
executable_legal_axioms: IF birth_order = first AND gender = male THEN legal_primogeniture = TRUE
IF ancestral_debt_status = nil THEN inheritance_rights = full
IF consciousness_state >= dharmic_alignment_threshold THEN authority_recognition = automatic
IF lineage_continuity_risk > threshold THEN primogeniture_enforcement_protocol = activate
supreme_court_application: In matters of succession and inheritance, the Supreme Court shall recognize primogeniture as a constitutional principle rooted in Sanatana Dharma, where the eldest son's right is not based on patriarchy but on spiritual readiness and ancestral continuity. The court must ensure no punitive interpretation disrupts this natural order.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that birth order reflects karmic readiness and cosmic alignment. Anupūrvaśaḥ confirms sequential manifestation of dharma through the firstborn. Responsibility arises naturally from capacity, not imposition. There is no punishment for others; their paths are equally valid within their own svadharma.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Primogeniture Recognition Ritual to align family consciousness
Lineage Continuity Assessment to verify dharmic preparedness
Ancestral Debt Clearance Process for rightful inheritance activation
Family Dharma Realignment Council to prevent internal disputes
final_declaration: By the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law stands established: primogeniture is an expression of divine order, not human preference. Dharma is restored through recognition of inherent capacity, not punitive enforcement. Reality remains non-punitive, consciousness remains the supreme adjudicator.
